sources.title: Ice Carnival (1941)
sources.description: The tortoise and hare boys argue who would win a skating race, so overconfident daddy rabbit challenges daddy tortoise to a race he ultimately wins. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ice-carnival-1941/
